data.title: Kit Demos's Flametet:  Jazz CD release project by Kit Demos — Kickstarter
data.name: Kit Demos
data.description: Free jazz utilizes acoustic instruments, analog electronics, modern composition with some of the best improvisers in Boston MA.

data.title: 100 Songs in 30 Days: Music Publishing the Old-Fashioned Way by David Scott Brown — Kickstarter
data.name: David Scott Brown
data.description: I have challenged myself to write 100 songs in 30 days. This will spur me to greater creativity. Songs will be performed and published.

data.title: The Great Postmodern Nightmare's self-titled debut album by Bryant Scott — Kickstarter
data.name: Bryant Scott
data.description: The Great Postmodern Nightmare is a professional big band from Chicago led by trombonist, composer, and musical architect Bryant Scott.

data.title: Tim Gill All-Stars Album; "Small Batch Bourbon!" by Tim Gill — Kickstarter
data.name: Tim Gill
data.description: The Tim Gill All-Stars are ready to release their sophomore album effort. Help us get the tracks mixed/mastered and the CD's pressed!

data.title: To my dad, Buddy Ebsen, for Father’s Day. Love, Kiki by Kiki Ebsen — Kickstarter
data.name: Kiki Ebsen
data.description: A collection of jazz standards inspired by the life and career of my father.

data.title: Jason Paul Curtis's summer album: "Faux Bourgeois Cafe" by Jason Paul Curtis — Kickstarter
data.name: Jason Paul Curtis
data.description: 8 original songs plus 2 covers: Django-gypsy/bossa exotica meets man vocals! Help Jason and Swinglab launch the next sound of summer.

data.title: Bob Myers - It's About Time II by Scott Myers — Kickstarter
data.name: Scott Myers
data.description: This is Bob Myers' second CD. His first was self-funded and released in 2001.

data.title: Elias Haslanger - LIVE at the Gallery by Elias Haslanger — Kickstarter
data.name: Elias Haslanger
data.description: The new live recording by Elias Haslanger and Church on Monday feat. Dr. James Polk, Jake Langley, Scott Laningham and Daniel Durham.

data.title: Martini Nights TV Pilot & Pay Per View Event by Brad "Martini" Chambers — Kickstarter
data.name: Brad "Martini" Chambers
data.description: We're throwing a party at a world famous Jazz club featuring a smokin' hot big band, 4 fabulous singers and EVERYONE is invited!

data.title: Catherine Feeny & Chris Johnedis -- Brand New Classic by Catherine Feeny — Kickstarter
data.name: Catherine Feeny
data.description: Acclaimed singer-songwriter and accomplished drummer/percussionist partner to record an adventurous modern classic.

data.title: South by Southwest by GMB Music Group — Kickstarter
data.name: GMB Music Group
data.description: We were selected to perform in the SxSw music festival, but now we need to make the travel arrangements.

data.title: "Dancing in the Streets":  A Tribute to the Music of Motown by Curtis W. Robinson, Jr — Kickstarter
data.name: Curtis W. Robinson, Jr
data.description: Honoring the musicians (The Funk Brothers) and the music of Motown. Liner notes by Ramsey Lewis.

data.title: LISA CASALINO'S HIGHLY ANTICIPATED 2ND STUDIO ALBUM! by Lisa Casalino — Kickstarter
data.name: Lisa Casalino
data.description: It's time to record & promote my second studio album! This one will feature more original tunes & jazz standards we know and love!

data.title: Love, squared: RISA is recording a vintage JAZZ studio ALBUM by Risa — Kickstarter
data.name: Risa
data.description: I love to sing for people. And I love jazz. Singing jazz for people... Well, that's LOVE, SQUARED. Be a part of the making of my album!

data.title: Help Erik Deutsch fund his next album 'Outlaw Jazz' by Erik Deutsch — Kickstarter
data.name: Erik Deutsch
data.description: Pianist/composer Erik Deutsch's new album "Outlaw Jazz" is ready come to life... help him get to the finish line!

data.title: DWJO Mini- Kickstarter Campaign to Finish THE CHASE by David White — Kickstarter
data.name: David White
data.description: Our new album is almost ready to be released! We need your help to complete the final step in the process.

data.title: Lisa Redfern: Jazz Standards CD "Once in a While" by Lisa Redfern — Kickstarter
data.name: Lisa Redfern
data.description: "Once in a While" is a CD of Lisa's favorite jazz standards. You may know her as a singer-songwriter, but look out!

data.title: "The Fountainhead"  Jazz Album Project by Kenneth Easton — Kickstarter
data.name: Kenneth Easton
data.description: I am trying to raise funds for musicians and studio costs to bring to  completion  an album of my original jazz compositions.

data.title: Phoenix Horns Debut Chamber Jazz Ensemble Album by Dean Barker — Kickstarter
data.name: Dean Barker
data.description: We've commissioned original music from national composers. The coming album will showcase their creative work. Your funding will help!

data.title: Breaking Ground - J.Deran & W.Perry CD Project by Jason Deran — Kickstarter
data.name: Jason Deran
data.description: The dynamic duo is creating some great music for all to hear.  Jason and Wes plan to create and distribute their own independent album.

data.title: JazzBonez CD "Watch It!" by Martin McCain — Kickstarter
data.name: Martin McCain
data.description: Summit Records has agreed to produce our debut album. We need your help to bring this project to life. Thanks for your support!

data.title: Join me creating my new CD "Bright Side of My Life" by Kaoruko Pilkington — Kickstarter
data.name: Kaoruko Pilkington
data.description: Jazz singer Kaoruko's new CD. From Ellington, Porter to Metheny, Bacharach and Webb.

data.title: The Party Band full-length album + Cosmic release party! by Seth Bailin — Kickstarter
data.name: Seth Bailin
data.description: The Party Band has written and recorded our first album! We are raising funds to press it on vinyl and CDs, hope you can help!

data.title: Vitality - Help me continue to make eclectic music by Gilbert Engle — Kickstarter
data.name: Gilbert Engle
data.description: Prolific eclectic composer wants to continue creating music.  Funding for participating musicians is extremely important

data.title: DYAN KANE with ROBERT TURNER & Company... by Dyan Kane — Kickstarter
data.name: Dyan Kane
data.description: Sultry Songstress DYAN KANE records with Passionate Jazz Pianist -on-Fire ROBERT TURNER to create Emotional Lightning in a Bottle!

data.title: KITCHEN LIGHT: Debut Jazz CD produced by Tommy Sims by DREA RHENEE' — Kickstarter
data.name: DREA RHENEE'
data.description: The KITCHEN LIGHT cast shadows on my living room wall. My first stage where I performed tunes for my mom & sis. Let me take you there!

data.title: Hot Jazz and Latin Luxury in Lima by Brenda Fredrick — Kickstarter
data.name: Brenda Fredrick
data.description: Promoting an "over the top" all inclusive jazz experience featuring top notch performers in a luxurious Latin setting in Lima, Peru.

data.title: Dancing in the Streets: A Tribute to the Music of Motown by Curtis W. Robinson, Jr — Kickstarter
data.name: Curtis W. Robinson, Jr
data.description: Honoring the musicians (The Funk Brothers) and the music of Motown. Liner notes by Ramsey Lewis.

data.title: Life Size - Debut Album! by Life Size — Kickstarter
data.name: Life Size
data.description: We recorded our first album, and it sounds great!  Now, we need funds to make the release as successful as possible.

data.title: A new style, Electronic Jazz by Mateen J. by Mateen — Kickstarter
data.name: Mateen
data.description: Mateen J's stylish electronic music has been described as a mix between Aphex Twin and jazz, he's now looking for your help.

data.title: Bend To The Light by Lafayette Harris Jr — Kickstarter
data.name: Lafayette Harris Jr
data.description: Lafayette's first CD in 5 years is almost ready to be released!

data.title: Wil Blades' Next Record! by Wil Blades — Kickstarter
data.name: Wil Blades
data.description: Hammond B-3 Organist, Wil Blades' sophomore record, featuring guitarist Jeff Parker from Tortoise and New Orleans drummer Simon Lott.

data.title: TERESA ANN LAMIRAND'S DEBUT ALBUM "MY LIFE UNFOLDING"" by TERESA ANN LAMIRAND — Kickstarter
data.name: TERESA ANN LAMIRAND
data.description: I AM A SINGER/SONGWRITER RECORDING MY DEBUT ALBUM OF ORIGINAL MATERIAL TITLED "MY LIFE UNFOLDING".....MUSIC IS SO MUCH A PART OF ME!

data.title: Kenny Lavender and His 17-Piece Big Band by Kenny Lavender — Kickstarter
data.name: Kenny Lavender
data.description: I'm recording my very 1st album soon with my 17-piece big band, in which I'll be playing trumpet, flugelhorn, as well as singing.

data.title: Hot Rhythm Holiday 2014 by Hot Rhythm Foundation — Kickstarter
data.name: Hot Rhythm Foundation
data.description: A jazz-era inspired dance and music community weekend - dance classes, music classes, social dancing, live jazz and dance competitions

data.title: Improvisational Solo Piano CD Based on Spiritual Themes by Dave Buehler — Kickstarter
data.name: Dave Buehler
data.description: This is a project to produce an improvisational solo piano CD based on spiritual themes.

data.title: Joey Pero Album Jazz Trumpet by Krista Whitley Castellarin — Kickstarter
data.name: Krista Whitley Castellarin
data.description: Joey Pero music kick starts your life and now you can kick start his next album! Dull mornings? Dull office? Joey Pero has you covered!

data.title: Keith Davis Trio - Still by Keith Davis Trio — Kickstarter
data.name: Keith Davis Trio
data.description: Keith Davis Trio - Still - All original compositions performed by the trio, Keith on piano, Ron Brendle on bass, Justin Watt on drums.

data.title: Freedom Work: Folk Forms and Variations by Lenny Tischler — Kickstarter
data.name: Lenny Tischler
data.description: A five movement Jazz suite, commemorating the universal struggle for freedom and justice sponsored by the Santa Fe Branch of NAACP

data.title: A Saxidentals Music Video!!! by Ben Hoff — Kickstarter
data.name: Ben Hoff
data.description: The Saxidentals are a Laie, HI based saxophone quartet. We have been playing gigs all around Laie and would love to make a music video!

data.title: Completion and distribution of recording" Where Are You Now" by Kevin Lutke — Kickstarter
data.name: Kevin Lutke
data.description: "Where Are You Now", the latest recording featuring composer and guitarist, Kevin Lutke, blending elements of jazz and classical.

data.title: FAMILIA: MY LATIN JAZZ JOURNEY - JAMES DREIER by James Dreier — Kickstarter
data.name: James Dreier
data.description: The first recording project under my name is a tribute to the things most important in my life: family, friends and playing Latin Jazz!
